title: CLAUDE.md
text: Fiscal Year Functions (R/fiscal_year.R): fy_year(), fy_label(), fy_quarter() - Convert dates fiscal year representations. Default fiscal year starts July (month 7). Data Normalization (R/normalize_phone.R, R/normalize_zip.R): Clean standardize phone numbers ZIP codes. support strict/lenient parsing modes. Session Setup (R/setup.R): fundr_setup() - Configure R session fundraising work. Disables scientific notation large dollar amounts display properly. Formatting (R/format.R): format_currency(), format_currency_short(), format_pct() - Format numbers currency strings proper thousands separators. Short format uses K/M/B suffixes compact display. Donor Analytics (R/donor.R): calc_age(), donor_status(), years_since(), total_giving_years(), consecutive_giving_years() - Calculate constituent age, classify donors Active/LYBUNT/SYBUNT/Lapsed/Never based fiscal year giving, compute years since date, track giving streaks. Bucketing Functions (R/buckets.R): bucket_gift_level(), bucket_rating_level() - Map numeric values categorical levels using reference data tables. Uses findInterval() threshold matching. Reference data stored data/ .rda files. Color Palettes (R/colors.R): fundr_colors(), fundr_palette(), scale_fill_fundr(), scale_colour_fundr() - Named hex colors ggplot2 discrete scales. Three palettes: primary (2 colors), secondary (10 colors), tertiary (4 colors). Currency Scales (R/scales.R): scale_y_currency(), scale_x_currency() - ggplot2 continuous scales format axis labels currency. Supports full format ($1,234,567) compact format ($1.2M) via short = TRUE. Plotting (R/theme_fundr.R, R/fonts.R): ggplot2 theme Google Fonts integration. require suggested packages (ggplot2, showtext, sysfonts). Includes legend_bottom() legend_position() helpers. Partial Dates (R/partial_date.R): parse_partial_date(), calc_age_partial(), date_precision() - Handle year-year-month dates commonly seen birth dates. Date Utilities (R/date_utils.R): date_interval(), bucket_recency(), is_within(), last_weekday(), next_weekday(), weekday_name() - Calculate time dates, bucket recency, find specific weekdays. File Utilities (R/files.R): latest_file(), read_latest(), list_recent_files() - Find read recent files directory. Case Conversion (R/case_convert.R): to_snake_case(), to_title_case(), to_camel_case(), convert_names() - Convert strings column names case formats. Utilities (R/utils.R): %notin%, %!%, comment_block(), comment_header(), comment_divider() - Convenience operators comment formatting helpers. SKY API (R/sky_api.R): sky_connect(), sky_get(), sky_get_all(), sky_test() - Integration Blackbaud SKY API Raiser’s Edge NXT. Requires httr jsonlite. Database (R/database.R): db_connect(), db_query(), db_test() - Database connection helpers SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite.
